attributes.action: NOW! IS THE TIME TO LET THE 'VIEW OF THE PEOPLE' ACTUALLY COME FROM THE PEOPLE!
attributes.additional_details: The chaos currently exuding from Parliament is not indicative of our United Kingdom, it's history or how we wish to be known in the world! Throughout the Brexit process a few handfuls of MPs have given themselves vote after vote whilst achieving nothing. Who are they to deny us just a second vote on this issue - whatever our persuasions we deserve a second referendum! I'm just a regular type of guy, but surely it's time for us to take responsibility for our country and all of our futures!
attributes.background:
Simply put, and due to the public knowledge accrued by us residents over the previous 3 years, the ONLY fair way to move forward is:
Revoke Article 50 and give the final vote back to the people.  Covering each base the options must be: 1.Remain  2.Leave with a deal  3.Leave with no deal. Thanks.
